00607          }
00608 
00609          if (flags & RPC_VARARRAY) {
00610             /* store array length at current out_param_ptr */
00611             max_size = *((INT *) out_param_ptr);
00612             param_size = *((INT *) prpc_param[i + 1]);
00613             *((INT *) out_param_ptr) = param_size;
00614 
00615             out_param_ptr += ALIGN8(sizeof(INT));
00616 
00617             param_size = ALIGN8(param_size);
00618 
00619             /* move remaining parameters to end of array */
00620             memcpy(out_param_ptr + param_size,
00621                    out_param_ptr + max_size + ALIGN8(sizeof(INT)),
00622                    (int) last_param_ptr -
00623                    ((int) out_param_ptr + max_size + ALIGN8(sizeof(INT))));
00624          }
00625 
00626          if (tid == TID_STRUCT)
00627             param_size = ALIGN8(rpc_list[index].param[i].n);
00628 
00629          out_param_ptr += param_size;
00630       }
00631 
00632    /* send return parameters */
00633    param_size = (int) out_param_ptr - (int) nc_out->param;
00634    nc_out->header.routine_id = status;
00635    nc_out->header.param_size = param_size;
00636 
00637    status = msend_tcp(sock, return_buffer, sizeof(NET_COMMAND_HEADER) + param_size);
00638 
00639    if (status < 0) {
00640       printf("mrpc_execute: msend_tcp() failed\n");
00641       return RPC_NET_ERROR;
00642    }
00643 
00644    return RPC_SUCCESS;
00645 }
